alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 5:25PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 9 inches. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult if not impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and reduce visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will taper off before daybreak Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
